metadata.title: How to enable the multiple Interrupt in an RX-family product

sections.content:
Question:
Is there a recommended method to enable the multiple Interrupt using the Firmware Integration Technology (FIT) of an RX-family product?
Answer:
Enable the nesting of interrupts by executing R_BSP_InterruptsEnable() to set the I flag to 1 (enable an interrupt) in the interrupt function. 
Suitable Products
RX
